name: Matrix.square_of_invertible
initialProofState:
n : Type u_1
m : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : Fintype n
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq n
inst✝³ : Fintype m
inst✝² : DecidableEq m
R : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : InvariantBasisNumber R
M : Matrix n m R
N : Matrix m n R
h : Eq (HMul.hMul M N) 1
h' : Eq (HMul.hMul N M) 1
⊢ Eq (Fintype.card n) (Fintype.card m)
decl:
theorem Matrix.square_of_invertible (M : Matrix n m R) (N : Matrix m n R) (h : M * N = 1)
    (h' : N * M = 1) : Fintype.card n = Fintype.card m :=
  card_eq_of_linearEquiv R (Matrix.toLinearEquivRight'OfInv h' h)
